registerMessage: Please choose your country code and enter your mobile number to get the verification code.
agree: By clicking continue you agree to MirrorFly
otpMessage: We have sent you the SMS. To complete the registration enter the 6 digit verification code below
noMessagesContent: Any new messages will appear here
noCallLogsContent: Any new calls will appear here
youCantSentMessageNoLonger: You can't send messages to this group because you're no longer a participant.
featureNotAvailable: You can't send messages to this group because Feature unavailable for your plan.
disableBusy: Disable busy status. Do you want to continue?

adminBlockedMessage: This application is no longer available for you.
adminBlockedMessageLabel: Please contact admin if you have any query.
youWantDeleteStatus: Do you want to delete the status?
unableDeleteBusyStatus: Unable to delete the Busy Status
busyStatusDescription: Your busy status will be set as auto-response to the messages received from individuals.
userBusyStatusDescription: Set busy status as the Auto response to the message received from the individuals
holdToRecord: Hold for Video, tap for photo
last5Message: The last 5 messages from this contact will be forwarded to admin. This Contact will not be notified.
reportThisGroupContent: The last 5 messages from this group will be forwarded to admin. No one in this group will be notified.
deletingYourAccountDescription3: Delete you from all of your MirrorFly groups
deleteConfirmation: To delete your account, confirm your country and enter your phone number.
deleteAccountReason: We hate to see you leave! Tell us why you are deleting your account:
tellUsImprove: Tell us how we can improve
feedbackDesc: We will store your feedback for future purpose
provideGroupNameIcon: Provide a Group Name and Icon
youAreNoLonger: You're no longer a participant in this group

titleContactMsg: Mirror Fly is a ready-to-go messaging solution for building enterprise-grade real-time chat IM applications that meet various degrees of requirements like team discussion, data sharing, task delegation and information handling on the go.
titleContactMsgTime: To have a detailed interaction with our experts
titleFaqMsg: Kindly checkout FAQ section for doubts regarding Mirror fly. We might have already answered your question.
title: Title.
pinLockDesc: Add more security with 4 digit secret PIN
fingerPrintIDDesc: Enable Fingerprint to unlock the app
appLockDesc: If App Lock enabled, the app will be locked automatically after 32 sec when it is not in use.
appLockNote: Note: Once a PIN is set, it will be expired in 31 days and has to be renewed.
autoDownloadLabel: Enable “Auto download” to turn all types of files received readily viewable
dataUsageSettingsLabel: Setup your mobile and wifi data usage based on media type
archiveSettingDec: Archived chats will remain archived when you receive a new message
lastSeenDec: Hiding the last seen activity to other users
googleTranslationMessage: Enable Translate Message to choose Translation Language
googleTranslationLanguageDoubleTap: Double Tap the received messages to translate
fileDoesNotExist: The Selected file Doesn't Exist or Unable to Open
youDoNotHaveApp: you may not have proper app to view this content
pinUpTo3: You can only pin up-to 3 chats
thisMessageForwardToAdmin: This message will be forwarded to admin.
textCopied: 1 Text Copied Successfully to the clipboard
deleteSelectedMessage: Are you sure you want to delete selected Message
deleteSelectedMessages: Are you sure you want to delete selected Messages
unableToDelete: Unable to delete the selected Messages

areYouClearChat: Are you sure you want to clear the chat?
audioTooShort: Recorded Audio Time is too Short
groupNoLonger: This group is no longer available
chatNoLonger: This chat is no longer available

googleMapKeyIsRequired: Google map key is required show location
smsContent:
Hey, MirrorFly is a real time chat, Audio and Video call solution for B2B and B2C.
 Download the app from this URL: https://app.mirrorfly.com

areYouLeave: Are you sure you want to leave from group?.
errorWhileAddingMember: Error while adding Members in this group
errorWhileMakeAdmin: Error while make admin this member
appNotificationsDesc: Notification behaviours for the group chat messages
pleaseEnterValidMobileWithCode: Please enter a valid mobile number with country code
unableConnectServer: Unable to Connect to Server. Please login Again
deleteStatus: Do you want to delete the status?
unableToDeleteProfileStatus: Unable to delete the Profile Status
areYouClearAllChat: Are you sure want to clear your conversation history?
serverError: Server error, kindly try again later
settingPermission: You will not receive notifications while the app is in background if you disable these permissions
filePermission: To send media, allow MirrorFly access to your device's photos,media, and files.
cameraPermission: To capture photos and video, allow MirrorFly access to the camera and storage.
locationPermission: MirrorFly needs access to your location in order to share your current location.
contactPermission: To help you connect with friends and family, allow MirrorFly access to your contacts.
contactSyncPermission: MirrorFly will continuously upload your contacts to its encrypted servers to let you discover and connect with your friends. Your contacts are uploaded using MirrorFly private contact discovery which means they are end-to-end encrypted and secured.
audioPermission: To send audio messages, allow MirrorFly access to your Microphone.
contactPermissionDenied: MirrorFly need the Contacts Permission in order to help you connect with friends and family, but they have been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select "Permissions", and enable "Contacts"
locationPermissionDenied: MirrorFly need the Location Permission in order to attach a location, but they have been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select "Permissions", and enable "Location".
cameraPermissionDenied: MirrorFly need the Camera and Storage Permission in order to capture photos and video, but they have been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select "Permissions", and enable "Camera" and "Storage".
cameraCapturePermanentlyDeniedContent: MirrorFly need the Camera and Microphone Permission in order to capture photos and video, but they have been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select "Permissions", and enable "Camera" and "Microphone".
writeStoragePermissionDenied: MirrorFly need the Storage Permission in order to download photos, media, and files, but they have been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select "Permissions", and enable "Storage".
storagePermissionDenied: MirrorFly need the Storage Permission in order to attach photos, media, and files, but they have been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select "Permissions", and enable "Storage".
microPhonePermissionDenied: MirrorFly need the Microphone Permission in order to send audio messages, but they have been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select "Permissions", and enable "Microphone".
audioCallPermissionDenied: MirrorFly need the Microphone Permission in order to call Family, but they have been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select "Permissions", and enable "Microphone".
videoCallPermissionDenied: MirrorFly need the Microphone and Camera Permissions in order to call Family, but they have been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select "Permissions", and enable "Microphone" and "Camera".
otherPermissionDenied: But they have been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select "Permissions", and enable
unableToLoadProfileData: Unable to load profile data, please login again
